title: Distant Authority Figure
description: We maintain a formal, hierarchical relationship with minimal personal connection, as evidenced by our low TrustScore (25.3) and nearly non-existent StrengthScore (0.6). They recognize my authority as the Consiglio Dei Dieci, while I acknowledge their position as a hardworking facchino of the docks, but our interactions remain limited to official capacities with an underlying caution typical of cross-class relations in La Serenissima.
